description: A North Carolina senior who missed out on prom because of coronavirus fears wasn't about to let a pandemic stop the party, so she brought it home instead.
source.name: CNN

title: Taco Bell rolls out taco bar kits to help you celebrate Cinco de Mayo at home
description: With restaurants across the nation closed for dine-in and most people social distancing, Cinco de Mayo won't be the same this year. But Taco Bell is making celebrating from home a bit easier with new, build-your-own taco kits.
content:

title: Pompeo claims China intentionally concealed coronavirus severity

title: US government will decide where remdesivir goes amid coronavirus pandemic, drugmaker says

title: France reports its lowest daily virus death toll since late March
description: The virus claimed the lives of 135 people in France in the most recent 24-hour window -- the country's lowest daily death toll from Covid-19 since March 22.

title: US stock futures fall as uncertainty around the economy persists
